ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Diablo 2 hacking program
ygData.msgSnippet: We play between 8pm to 1am.  We hand ard avatars or singapore channel. Now we got a constant grp: Leshrec (amazon, the scout bowyer), Swalk~PA (paladin,
ygData.messageBody:
We play between 8pm to 1am. We hand ard "avatars" or "singapore" channel.

Now we got a constant grp: Leshrec (amazon, the scout bowyer), Swalk~PA
(paladin, with his aura our dam raise alot) and myself (traffic cleaner
with WW). I think Les and Swalk are both at mid 20s liao, so very soon
they will PL to 30plus. In fact Swalk just restart his paladin 2-3 days
back and now he is lvl 25 at nightmare act 2.

Les, after u left yesterday, we chop chop do the act 2 quest, and we stop
at 2am at the 2nd last waypt. We got the staff and once we meet u tonight,
we can clear act 2 and go act 3.

Btw, I only did quest 1 and 6 in my normal mode, and I got the quest eye.
Say I bring this eye to nightmare, can it be imbued with other nightmare
quest brain and stuffs to make the flail? I dun think I wanna go back
normal mode to do the quest liao (act 3 is big and I hate those shooters).

Another funny thing. Last time when we did the act 4 quest 2 (shatter the
soulstone), somehow the stone come back to me (dunno bug or wat) and when I
open the quest window, it says the quest is done. Now I got a soulstone on
me, does tat mean I can shatter it again at normal lvl and get some more
gems?

I found a rare battle scryre last night, just b4 I log. Dam so so, only up
to 60+ but raise barb skill by 2, cold dam and steal hp 9%. With this, I
can WW all the way even kena cursed. Previously I only got a hp stealing
ring and the hp steal not enuff to cope with the dam I kena due to curse.
Now I WW here and there those cursing casters also np liao. Maybe I will
try if I can do away the hp stealing ring and pass to Les (change to a wyrm
ring tat add 58 mana, hehe).

Somehow I think once barb got WW, he can PL others quite well by clearing
the traffic ;) I almost make a wrong move by giving WW up and train on
bash instead...phew.

We dun have specific game name/pw, unless u mean PA's guild game. But
maybe for helping kaki lang sake, setting our own private game is better,
coz most of PA members know their game/pw.
